Class UpDownPIDController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.PIDController

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.parsing.IDevice, edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.parsing.IUtility

    public class UpDownPIDController
extends edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.PIDController
    A PIDController with different gains for up and down.
    Author:
    Michael Smith
